channel.title: Latest Tutorials on Tech Index
channel.description: Recent content in Latest Tutorials on Tech Index

item.title: How to Calibrate Your iPhone Battery for Maximum Longevity
item.description: Tired of your iPhone battery dying way too fast? Learn the real calibration tricks Apple doesn’t advertise, plus the habits that actually extend lithium-ion life in 2025.

item.title: How to Deploy a Static Website to GitHub Pages for Free
item.description: A step-by-step guide on deploying static websites to GitHub Pages without spending a dime, covering setup, configuration, and common pitfalls for beginners and pros alike.

item.title: How to Use the New Whatsapp Secret Code Feature for Locked Chats
item.description: WhatsApp's secret code hides locked chats completely—type it in search to unlock. Android/iOS steps inside, plus PK tweaks for slow nets. No more nosy eyes.

item.title: How to Clear Cache and Cookies on Every Major Browser (2025 Guide)
item.description: Complete 2025 guide to clearing cache and cookies on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, and more. Step-by-step instructions for desktop and mobile with troubleshooting tips to fix site glitches, improve performance, and boost privacy.

item.title: Using ChatGPT for Automating Your Daily Mail Sending Process
item.description: A detailed guide on using ChatGPT to automate your daily email workflow, saving time and increasing productivity.
